comment.author: 21751800@N00
comment._content: Are you sure that's a polar bear? The card may have faded with time and a regular bear would have a connection/interest in honey.

comment.author: 36988361@N08
comment._content: You are correct; this is not a polar bear.  However, since other cards from this set include an anthropomorphic pansy (also posted on this flickr site) and children with a dog, it is likely that the designer selected whimsical images rather than images specifically related to the holiday.

comment.author: 21751800@N00
comment._content: Thank you! : D (and Happy New Year!)
